enrolled-dateline.#text: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Thursday, the third day of January, two thousand and thirteen

congress.#text: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America

official-title.#text: Permitting the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony as part of the commemoration of the days of remembrance of victims of the Holocaust.

text.#text: The rotunda of the Capitol is authorized to be used on April 11, 2013, for a ceremony as part of the commemoration of the days of remembrance of victims of the Holocaust. Physical preparations for the ceremony shall be carried out in accordance with such conditions as the

header.#text: Use of rotunda for holocaust days of remembrance ceremony

role.#text: Clerk of the House of Representatives.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: HCON 14 ENR: Permitting the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony as part of the commemoration of the days of remembrance of victims of the Holocaust.
